sheep.name: White Fudge
sheep.description: White Fudge is a majestic suffolk ewe with a gentle disposition. Born in 2012, she boasts a beautiful white fleece and is sure to enhance any flock.

sheep.name: Brownie
sheep.description: Brownie, a delightful merino ewe born in 2015, is known for her soft brown wool and friendly demeanor. She would make a wonderful addition to your flock.

sheep.name: Fluffykins
sheep.description: Meet Fluffykins, an adorable suffolk ewe born in 2018. With his fluffy white coat and playful personality, she's sure to capture your heart.

sheep.name: Charming
sheep.description: Charming, a charming Southdown ram born in 2019, has a lovely disposition and beautiful fleece. He would make a wonderful companion for your flock.

sheep.name: Cotton
sheep.description: Cotton, a regal romney ewe born in 2017, is known for his fine wool and strong build. She would be a valuable addition to any shepherd's flock.

sheep.name: Snowflake
sheep.description: Snowflake, a graceful lincoln wether born in 2016, is known for his striking appearance and gentle nature. He would bring elegance to any flock.

team.name: Blake Clabuagh
team.funFact: The first time I started programming was in college

farmers.name: John
farmers.description: John is the head of the family. He inherited the farm from his parents and has been farming since he was a young boy. He is knowledgeable about different farming techniques and is always looking for ways to improve the farm's productivity

farmers.name: Maggie
farmers.description: Maggie is John's wife. She helps manage the farm and is also in charge of selling their produce at the local market. She is known for her delicious homemade jams and pies.

farmers.name: Emily
farmers.description: Emily is John and Maggie's eldest daughter. She is studying agriculture at university with the hope of modernizing their family farm with what she learns.

farmers.name: Peter
farmers.description: Peter is the Oldest son who loves working on the farm. He is responsible for taking care of the animals and is particularly fond of the horses.
